LetterContent:
Dear {infringerName},

I am writing to you directly from {companyName} regarding the unauthorized distribution and use of our copyrighted material. It has come to our attention that you are involved in the unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of copyrighted material owned by {companyName}, including but not limited to {productName}.

We kindly request that you cease any further distribution or use of our copyrighted material immediately. As the copyright owner, we take this matter seriously, and we believe it is crucial to prevent further infringement on our intellectual property.

We acknowledge that your actions may not have been malicious, and we appreciate the opportunity to resolve this matter amicably. Please consider this notice as a formal request to cease and desist all unauthorized activities involving {companyName}'s copyrighted material.

We trust that you will take immediate action to remove or disable access to the infringing material. Failure to comply with this request may result in legal action to protect our intellectual property rights.

We declare under penalty of perjury that the information provided in this notice is accurate, and we are the authorized representatives of {companyName}, the copyright owner of the material in question.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. We hope for a swift resolution to ensure the protection of our intellectual property.

Sincerely,

{companyName}
